message.entry: Each cell in LABEL must be a character vector.
The LABEL cell array must not contain a new line character, \\n, or a carriage return character, \\r
The number of columns in POSITION must be 4 for the 'rectangle' shape, or 3 for the 'circle' shape.
The length of LABEL must be equal to the number of rows in POSITION.
The Name-Value argument 'ShowOrientation' may only be set if SHAPE is set to 'rectangle' and POSITION is an M-by-5 matrix.
The number of colors must be equal to the number of rows in POSITION.
The number of planes in input image must be fixed.
